snippet: SFX Entertainment, a promoter of dance music events, is struggling with financial problems. The event outside Los Angeles was set for Sept. 25 and 26.
abstract: SFX Entertainment, dance events promoter that is struggling financially, cancels One Tribe festival in Southern California.
lead_paragraph: SFX Entertainment, a promoter of dance music events, is struggling with financial problems. The event outside Los Angeles was set for Sept. 25 and 26.

headline.main: SFX Cancels One Tribe Festival, Citing Weak Ticket Sales
headline.print_headline: Business Briefing; Dance Music Promoter Cancels California Festival
